title: Short title
context: ARTICLE 1. [OLD] GENERAL PROVISIONS §§490:1-101 to 490:1-208 REPEALED. L 2004, c 162, §18. ARTICLE 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS PART 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS §490:1-101 Short title. (a) This chapter may be cited as the Uniform Commercial Code. (b) This article may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code&ndash;General Provisions. [L 2004, c 162, pt of §1]
